Common.metaTitle: Panielix Solutions — Web Development and Digital Marketing
Common.metaDescription: We build fast, high-converting websites for small & medium businesses.

form.name: Name *
form.agreeContact: By submitting, you agree to be contacted about your inquiry.

Hero.title: Your Website Should Make You Money, Not Cost You Money.
Hero.subtitle: We build high-value, lead-generating websites for small and medium businesses ready to grow. Stop losing customers and start converting them.
Hero.badgeNoFees: No Hidden Fees or Long Contracts

Benefits.title: Your Website is Your #1 Sales Tool. We'll Make it a Winner.
Benefits.intro: Stop settling for an underperforming website. A professional online presence is crucial for attracting customers, building credibility, and driving growth in today's digital-first world.

attract.title: Attract More Customers
attract.body: Our SEO-optimized websites are designed to rank higher on Google, bringing more qualified leads directly to you.

convert.title: Convert Visitors into Sales
convert.body: We use proven conversion design principles to turn your website visitors into paying customers and boost your revenue.

trust.title: Build Unshakeable Trust
trust.body: A polished, modern website establishes your authority and builds the credibility needed to win over discerning customers.

Solutions.title: Solutions Tailored for Growth
Solutions.intro: We don't sell packages; we provide value-driven solutions. Find the perfect fit to achieve your business goals.

landing.title: Landing Page
landing.desc: Perfect for validating an idea or driving conversions for a single, focused campaign.

business.title: Business Website
business.desc: Establish a strong online presence and showcase your core services effectively.

content.title: Content-Driven Website
content.desc: Become an authority in your niche and attract organic traffic with a content-driven platform.

custom.title: Custom Build
custom.desc: For unique projects requiring e-commerce, custom features, or specific integrations.

Ideas.title: Ideas to Inspire Your Website
Ideas.intro: Not sure what type of website you need? Here are 15 high-impact ideas that can turn visitors into paying customers across different industries.

restaurants.title: Restaurants & Cafés
restaurants.desc: Show your full menu online with photos and prices. Add a QR code on tables so customers can view instantly and call to order.

gyms.title: Gyms & Fitness Centers
gyms.desc: Highlight membership packages, schedules, and trainers. Add sign-up forms to convert visitors into paying members.

construction.title: Construction & Contractors
construction.desc: Showcase past projects, testimonials, and contact options. Build trust and attract clients for bigger jobs.

agencies.title: Marketing Agencies
agencies.desc: List services, packages, and case studies. A sharp site gives instant authority and helps close more deals.

shops.title: Shops & Boutiques
shops.desc: Showcase products, brand story, and Google Maps location. Drive both online and in-person sales.

clinics.title: Clinics & Health Professionals
clinics.desc: Share services, pricing, and contact info. Add booking forms so patients can easily schedule appointments.

events.title: Event Planners & Venues
events.desc: Promote packages, display past events, and use galleries. Make it easy for clients to book you fast.

tutors.title: Tutors & Coaches
tutors.desc: Showcase expertise, packages, and testimonials. Let students or parents schedule sessions online.

realEstate.title: Real Estate Agents
realEstate.desc: List available properties with photos, pricing, and contact options. Generate more qualified leads instantly.

spas.title: Spas & Beauty Salons
spas.desc: Show treatments, prices, and before/after results. Add booking links to fill your calendar 24/7.

transport.title: Transportation Services
transport.desc: Promote airport transfers, limo services, or delivery. Customers can see prices and book directly online.

nonprofits.title: Nonprofits & Charities
nonprofits.desc: Share your mission, events, and donation options. A modern site builds trust and drives more support.

pets.title: Pet Services
pets.desc: Promote grooming, walking, or boarding services. Add galleries and testimonials to attract more pet owners.

it.title: IT & Tech Services
it.desc: Highlight your services, pricing, and success stories. Capture more B2B leads with professional credibility.

travel.title: Travel & Tourism
travel.desc: Show packages, destinations, and booking info. Inspire visitors to reach out and plan their next trip.

Work.title: Our Work Delivers Tangible Results
Work.desc: We deliver stunning, high-performance websites that translate into real business growth.

Process.title: Our Efficiency-Focused Process
Process.intro: We've streamlined our process to deliver maximum value and get your revenue-generating website live, faster.

s1.title: Strategy & Quote
s1.body: We define your goals and provide a clear, value-based quote.

s2.title: Rapid Development
s2.body: Our team builds your high-speed, conversion-focused website using an agile, efficient workflow.

s3.title: Collaborative Review
s3.body: We work with you to refine and perfect the site, ensuring it aligns perfectly with your vision.

s4.title: Launch & Empower
s4.body: We deploy your site and provide the training and support you need to start generating leads immediately.

MarketingPowerhouse.title: More Than a Website: A Marketing Powerhouse
MarketingPowerhouse.body: A great website is the foundation of your digital marketing. It works 24/7 to attract, engage, and convert customers, acting as your most efficient salesperson. We build websites that are not just beautiful, but are engineered to be high-performance marketing engines for your business.

bullets.leadGen: Lead Generation Machine: Capture high-quality leads directly through optimized forms and clear calls-to-action.
bullets.authority: Enhanced Brand Authority: A professional site builds trust and positions you as a leader in your industry.
bullets.insights: Data-Driven Insights: Integrated analytics allow you to understand your customers and make smarter business decisions.

Testimonials.title: Real Results from Businesses Like Yours
Testimonials.desc: What it's like working with {brandName} in our clients own words.

northshore.name: Marcus Reid — Northshore Roofing (Vancouver, BC)
northshore.quote: I asked for something simple where folks could see photos of past jobs and call me. That’s exactly what I got—no fluff. Calls picked up within two weeks and the gallery loads fast even on site.

copperSpoon.name: Amelia Brooks — The Copper Spoon (Manchester, UK)
copperSpoon.quote: They put our menu online with a QR for tables and added click-to-call. We get fewer ‘are you open?’ messages and more actual bookings. Staff love not hunting for the latest PDF.

brightline.name: Dylan Carter — Brightline Fitness (Boston, MA)
brightline.quote: Our old site was basically a flyer. Now we show classes, memberships, and real photos. People sign up for a trial online, and my phone stopped being quiet on Mondays.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Clear, practical answers to help you understand how we work.

pricing.title: Pricing & Payments
pricing.a1: Pricing depends on scope. Landing pages are the most affordable, while multi-page business websites and advanced projects vary by requirements. After a quick discovery call, we’ll provide a clear, fixed quote with deliverables.
pricing.a2: Typically 50% upfront and 50% at launch. For larger builds we can split into milestones. We accept major credit cards and bank transfers.
pricing.a3: All packages include design, development, responsive layout, performance optimization, SEO-friendly setup, 1 year of hosting, 1 year of domain registration, and 1 year of professional email.
pricing.a4: You keep ownership of all work completed and paid for. Any finished assets or code will be delivered to you at the point of cancellation.

timeline.title: Timeline & Process
timeline.q1: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.a1: Most landing pages launch in 2–3 weeks. Business websites (multi-page) usually take 4–6 weeks depending on scope, content readiness, and feedback. Custom projects can extend longer.
timeline.q2: How many revisions do I get?
timeline.a2: We include structured feedback rounds during design and pre-launch. Small changes are expected; major scope changes may adjust cost or timeline, but we’ll always confirm with you first.
timeline.q3: Can you work with tight deadlines?
timeline.a3: Yes. If capacity allows, we can prioritize urgent projects and deliver faster timelines.
timeline.q4: Do I own the website once it’s complete?
timeline.a4: Yes. Once the final payment is made, you receive full ownership of your website, code, and assets.

seo.title: SEO & Analytics
seo.q1: Will my site be optimized for search engines?
seo.a1: Yes. Every website includes on-page SEO best practices: clean structure, metadata, mobile optimization, performance tuning, and sitemaps.
seo.a2: Yes. We optimize images, code, and caching for speed, aiming for excellent Core Web Vitals and sub-second perceived load times.
seo.a3: Yes. We include Google Analytics setup (and can add other basic tracking if requested) so you can monitor visitors and conversions.
seo.q4: Can you migrate my old site and preserve SEO?
seo.a4: Yes. We can move existing content, set up redirects, and retain as much SEO value as possible.

features.title: E-commerce & Features
features.a1: Yes. We can set up product catalogs, checkout, shipping, and payment integrations depending on your business needs.
features.q2: Can you integrate bookings, payments, or tools I already use?
features.a2: Yes. We regularly integrate booking systems, CRMs, payment gateways, newsletters, and other business tools.
features.q3: Will I be able to update my site myself?
features.a3: Yes. We can set up a content management system (CMS) so you can edit text, images, and blog posts without technical skills.

support.title: Support, Hosting & Security
support.q1: Do I need to buy hosting, a domain, or email?
support.a1: No. Every package already includes 1 year of hosting, 1 year of domain registration, and 1 year of professional email. After the first year, you can renew with us or manage these on your own.
support.q2: How secure will my website be?
support.a2: Security best practices are built-in: HTTPS (SSL), regular updates, and basic hardening. We also configure automatic backups for peace of mind.
support.q3: Do you offer support after launch?
support.a3: Yes. We remain available for technical support, updates, or improvements. We can also help you extend hosting, email, and domain services after the first year.

tech.title: Tech & Setup
tech.a1: We use modern, proven technologies like Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and cloud hosting providers such as AWS or Vercel.
tech.a2: We follow accessibility best practices (semantic HTML, alt text, contrast, mobile support) to make your website usable for everyone.
tech.q3: Do you work with clients in the US, Canada, and the UK?
tech.a3: Yes. We regularly work remotely with businesses across North America and the UK, handling communication, support, and billing seamlessly.

contentBranding.title: Content & Branding
contentBranding.q1: Who provides the content and images?
contentBranding.a1: You can supply your own, or we can guide you on what’s needed. If you don’t have everything ready, we’ll help structure the content during the project.
contentBranding.a2: Yes. If you already have a logo and colors, we’ll build around them. If not, we can design a simple, professional identity for your website.

legal.title: Legal & Policies
legal.q1: Do you add privacy and legal pages?
legal.a1: Yes. We provide basic Privacy, Terms of Service, and Cookie pages as part of every project. For full compliance (e.g., GDPR/CCPA), we recommend having your lawyer review them.

Contact.title: Ready to Grow Your Business?
Contact.cta: Let's build a website that gets you results. Fill out the form for a free, no-obligation proposal.

content.label: Tell us about your project
content.placeholder: What are your business goals? Who is your target audience? Any sites you like?
